de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.drawable

Class TabSwitcherDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.drawable.TabSwitcherDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TabSwitcherListener

    public class TabSwitcherDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements TabSwitcherListener
    A drawable, which allows to display the number of tabs, which are currently contained by a TabSwitcher. It must be registered at a TabSwitcher instance in order to keep the displayed label up to date. It therefore implements the interface TabSwitcherListener.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • onSelectionChanged

        public final void onSelectionChanged(@NonNull
                                     TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                     int selectedTabIndex,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Tab selectedTab)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected tab has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed tab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected tab as an Integer value or -1, if the tab switcher does not contain any tabs
        selectedTab - The currently selected tab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the tab switcher does not contain any tabs

      • onTabAdded

        public final void onTabAdded(@NonNull
                             TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                             int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Tab tab,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation animation)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when a tab has been added to the tab switcher.
        Specified by:
        onTabAdded in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed tab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null
        index - The index of the tab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        tab - The tab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The tab may not be null
        animation - The animation, which has been used to add the tab, as an instance of the class Animation. The animation may not be null

      • onAllTabsRemoved

        public final void onAllTabsRemoved(@NonNull
                                   TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                   @NonNull
                                   Tab[] tab,
                                   @NonNull
                                   Animation animation)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when all tabs have been removed from the tab switcher.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsRemoved in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed tab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null
        tab - An array, which contains the tabs, which have been removed, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no tabs have been removed
        animation - The animation, which has been used to remove the tabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The animation may not be null
